item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: I found that Ubuntu and Debian by default open all ports to worldwide (no limitation in iptables), this is not good, though ubuntu declares that there is no service listening on external interface by default.
item.content:encoded: I found that Ubuntu and Debian by default open all ports to worldwide (no limitation in iptables), this is not good, though ubuntu declares that there is no service listening on external interface by default.

item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: BTW, 4 core 6G is powerful :D - I still have enough memory to open a fat IE.
